 Steve and all, people like those have what's known as "concrete minds or t=
hinking"=C2=A0 they are very limited, they are the ones that doubted the Wr=
ight Brothers, could fly, they were laughed and scorned, as were all the gr=
eats in fact I think that it was, Einstein that once said that "great spiri=
ts have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds," one day=
 they will shame themselves Steve. sf

          =C2=A0                            =
         =C2=A0
 Been thinking and decided that we are not wrong in our bel=
iefs.=C2=A0 If we  can help find a missing child as so many do with $30 sha=
ck hacks, than where is  the harm and the threat.
 =C2=A0
 Science spends b=
illions of dollars each and every year to find a cure for  cancer with no r=
esults.=C2=A0 I'm talking about a $30 radio that may help and  has.=C2=A0 S=
eems like we have the upper hand in the matter.=C2=A0 Just because  our met=
hods are not accepted as the norm, does that mean that it serves no  purpos=
e.
 =C2=A0
 If society spent billions of dollars on ghost box research ever=
y year, we  wouldn't even be having a conversation.
 =C2=A0
 p.s.---- Moder=
n science has found a cure for cancer, they just can't reveal  it because t=
hey are making a fortune off of treatments.
 =C2=A0
 p.s.s.----Thanx RJ for=
 posting that link for that show.....Why are you here  anyway?
 =C2=A0
 -St=
eve H.

<div> </div>
 
<div>Been thinking and decided =
that we are not wrong in our beliefs.  If we  can help find a missing =
child as so many do with $30 shack hacks, than where is  the harm and the t=
hreat.</div>
 
<div> </div>
 
<div>Science spends billions of dollars =
each and every year to find a cure for  cancer with no results.  I'm t=
alking about a $30 radio that may help and  has.  Seems like we have t=
he upper hand in the matter.  Just because  our methods are not accept=
ed as the norm, does that mean that it serves no  purpose.</div>
 
<div>&nb=
sp;</div>
 
<div>If society spent billions of dollars on ghost box research=
 every year, we  wouldn't even be having a conversation.</div>
 
<div>&nbsp=
;</div>
 
<div>p.s.---- Modern science has found a cure for cancer, they ju=
st can't reveal  it because they are making a fortune off of treatments.</d=
iv>
 
<div> </div>
 
<div>p.s.s.----Thanx RJ for posting that link for=
 that show.....Why are you here  anyway?</div>
 
<div> </div>
 
<div>-=
Steve H.</div>
